sentences.en: Go on, then, sing us a song!
sentences.cn: 那么，来吧，给我们唱首歌！

sentences.en: He started to sing and I joined in.
sentences.cn: 他开始唱起歌来，然后我也跟着唱起来。

sentences.en: He started to speak in a nasal sing-song voice.
sentences.cn: 他开始用一种带有鼻音的、抑扬顿挫的声调说话。

sentences.en: How about a nice sing-along around the piano?
sentences.cn: 围在钢琴边来个合唱怎么样？

sentences.en: I can't sing.
sentences.cn: 我不会唱歌。

sentences.en: I sing about love most of the time.
sentences.cn: 我大多唱爱情歌曲。

sentences.en: I’ve never been able to sing in tune (= sing the correct notes ) .
sentences.cn: 我唱歌总是跑调。

sentences.en: Most children enjoy singing.
sentences.cn: 大多数孩子都喜欢唱歌。

sentences.en: Read the on-screen lyrics and sing along.
sentences.cn: 跟着屏幕上的歌词一起唱。

sentences.en: She can sing beautifully.
sentences.cn: 她唱歌很好听。

sentences.en: She didn't know anything about music but she liked to sing.
sentences.cn: 虽然她对音乐一无所知，但却爱唱歌。

sentences.en: She patiently sang the baby to sleep .
sentences.cn: 她耐心地唱歌哄宝宝入睡。

sentences.en: She wanted to hear him sing in person.
sentences.cn: 她想听他现场演唱。

sentences.en: Sing up , fellows, this is supposed to be a celebration, not a funeral!
sentences.cn: 伙计们,大声唱, 这是开庆祝会, 不是送葬!

sentences.en: Their voices blend marvellously as they sing in chorus.
sentences.cn: 他们合唱时嗓音非常和谐.

sentences.en: There were loud groans when he started to sing.
sentences.cn: 他刚开始歌唱时有人发出了很大的嘘声.

sentences.en: We had a great time singing some of the old songs .
sentences.cn: 我们唱了一些老歌，非常开心。

sentences.en: We heard a voice sing out in a clear, sharp tone.
sentences.cn: 我们听到了一阵清脆嘹亮的歌声。

sentences.en: When he was a little lad, I used to sing him lullabies.
sentences.cn: 在他小时候, 我常常给他唱摇篮曲.

sentences.en: You can sing along to your favourite Elvis hits.
sentences.cn: 你可以跟着一起唱你最喜爱的“猫王”的热门歌曲。

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)具有各种鲜明特征的
改变（对某人或某物的）看法（或态度）

phrases.phrase: sing from the same hymn (或 song) sheet
sing in (或 out) the new (或 old) year

phrases.tran_cn: (失败、受挫折后)变得老实，变得沉默寡言
v. 更用力地唱；使劲唱

trans.tran_en: to produce a musical sound with your voice

trans.tran_cn: 耳鸣，〈诗〉作诗，歌颂，赞美，称赞，唱着使…
trans.tran_en: to produce a musical sound with your voice

trans.tran_cn: （鸟）鸣，嗡嗡叫，呜呜作响，发嗖嗖声
